work_text_project01: My first project with React, i worked with a colleague of my bootcamp, We have made a personal movie list webapp with a external API fetchs.
work_text_project02: My first project with React, i worked with a colleague of my bootcamp, We have made a personal movie list webapp with a external API fetchs.
work_text_project03: This is my first portfolio website, i made it quickly fromscratch with only react & tailwindcss, another one is planned in NextJS soon.
work_text_project04: After worked on multiples small projects for learn the basics of NextJS, i'm enthousiat to start a real project with you.
about_description_1: I am 25 years old, I currently reside in Portugal, but I have lived almost all my life in France.
about_description_2: After studies and experiences in different fields related to computer science, I decided in September to stody the web development via Ironhack School.
about_description_3: Following the Ironhack bootcamp, I did personal projects to train myself and try to be ready for the job market.
about_description_4: Curious of all related to the WEB environment, I am very enthusiast to start a new experience.
about_hobbies_1: Passionate about football & tennis, likes to ride motocross sometimes and I enjoy esports too.
